channel.title: Writing on Random Bits of Wisdom
channel.description: Recent content in Writing on Random Bits of Wisdom

item.title: [Quote] What Do I Know?
item.description: I happen to know and have worked together with Dom. A really inspiring person, and one, whose opinions I often share. Particularly, this one on writing and sharing your knowdledge with the world: Don’t question whether something is advanced enough to share it. Don’t worry if that knowledge already exists on the internet. The only question you need to ask yourself is this: What do I know? What do I know?
item.content:
I happen to know and have worked together with Dom. A really inspiring person, and one, whose opinions I often share. Particularly, this one on writing and sharing your knowdledge with the world:

Don’t question whether something is advanced enough to share it. Don’t worry if that knowledge already exists on the internet. The only question you need to ask yourself is this:

What do I know?

What do I know? · islovely
You know a lot of things others don’t. Help them by sharing what you know, no matter how easy or obvious you might think it is.
https://islovely.co |
